paragraph.en: Goran Group is a diverse conglomerate, housing multiple sectors each characterized by distinct methodologies. A cohesive and proficient team, under the leadership of the Chief Executive Officer and the oversight of the monitoring and planning committee, strives to enhance the organization's gains and foster its growth.

paragraph.en: United in Excellence, Goran Group thrives across diverse sectors, guided by visionary leadership. With a professional team and strategic

paragraph.ar: United in Excellence, Goran Group thrives across diverse sectors, guided by visionary leadership. With a professional team and strategic

paragraph.en: Mr. Khalil, entered business from its narrow gate and insisted to work alone as in 1981 he started with setting up a small store for selling agricultural materials. Although he started business at a young age, yet he finished his education. Currently, he is head of the Administration Board of Goran Group, which consists of several trading companies, constructions, and selling power generators, medical and plastic surgery materials, and equipment.
